channel.title: My Works on Subhadeep Majumder
channel.description: Recent content in My Works on Subhadeep Majumder

item.title: Unsupervised ML: K-Means Clustering
item.description: In this Mini Project, I have predicted the optimum number of clusters using K-Means from the given ‘Iris’ dataset, and represented it visually. Way to the Github repository

item.title: Project 1: Forest Fires in Amazon
item.description: In this project I try to understand the patterns followed by the forest fires in the Amazon rain forest, possible factors-seasons,etc. affecting it and forecast to find what awaits in the future. Way to The Github Repository
